com.googlecode.aluminumproject.libraries.core.actions
Interface LoopInformation

public interface LoopInformation

Provides information about a loop in a looping action.

See Also:
Each, Repeat

Method Summary
 int getCount()
          Returns the number of loops.
 int getIndex()
          Returns the index of the loop.
 boolean isFirst()
          Determines whether this is the first loop.
 boolean isLast()
          Determines whether this is the last loop.
 

Method Detail

getIndex

int getIndex()
Returns the index of the loop.

Returns:
the current loop index (zero-based)

getCount

int getCount()
Returns the number of loops. Note that this might be an expensive operation.

Returns:
the number of times that the looping action will loop

isFirst

boolean isFirst()
Determines whether this is the first loop.

Returns:
true if the loop is the first one, false otherwise

isLast

boolean isLast()
Determines whether this is the last loop.

Returns:
true if the loop is the last one, false otherwise
